resources.string: Please grant permissions to allow synchronization
Remote folder is not empty. All files will be downloaded and synced with your device. Save anyway?
In order to synchronize your files we need full access to your files. Go to settings to enable the permission
As we run in the background, we need to tell android not to remove permissions. Go to settings and disable \"Remove permissions if app isn\'t used\"
As we run in the background, we need to tell android not to remove permissions. Go to settings and disable \"Remove permissions and free up space\"
As we run in the background, we need to tell android not to remove permissions. Go to settings and disable \"Pause app activity if unused\"

In order to synchronize faster we need to disable battery optimization. If you deny this permission synchronization will still happen but only when charging, less than once a day. Press "Next" to proceed
We will send you notifications if anything goes wrong (such as DAV server unreacheable). Press "Next" to proceed
In order to synchronize your files we need full access to your files. Press "Next" to proceed
Easy sync will keep your files synchronized with your DAV server
